select ceil(count(*)/15) cnt from (select * from department where department_id != 0) d , employee e where d.department_id = e.department_id
and d.department_id=#{department_id}
and d.department_name like '%' || #{department_name} || '%'
and e.employee_name like '%' || #{employee_name} || '%'
select department_id, department_name from department where department_id != 0 order by department_name asc
